mapper.select: select cfg_val1 from tm_task_control where task_id=#{task_id} and cfg_name = #{cfg_name}

select task.task_id, task.task_type, task.task_name, task.task_comment, control.cfg_name, control.cfg_val1, control.cfg_val2, control.end_time from tm_task_control control, com_mt_task task where task.task_name=control.task_id and task.task_name = #{task_name} order by control.cfg_name, control.cfg_val1
insert into com_bt_task_history ( task_id, process_time, process_type ) value ( #{task_id}, #{process_time}, #{process_type} )
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.process_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') FROM com_bt_task_history t WHERE t.task_id=#{taskId} and t.process_type=1 ORDER BY t.process_time desc LIMIT 0 ,1
